name: Sierra Studio Suite | 1 King
description: 500-square foot studio suite in the Sierra Tower featuring one king-size bed with a living area, dining for four, and a wet bar. Two flat-screen TVs, in-room safe, high-speed Wi-Fi, and premium amenities make this the perfect base for your golf getaway.
shortDescription: 500 sq ft studio suite with living area, dining for four, and wet bar in the Sierra Tower.

meta.title: Sierra Studio Suite 1 King – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Sierra Studio Suite at Eldorado Resort Reno – 500 sq ft with living area, dining for four, and wet bar.

testimonials.quote: Visited Sierra Studio Suite | 1 King during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: John K.

testimonials.quote: Sierra Studio Suite | 1 King was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: James D.
